verbs.description: [ARG1: Gasoline prices] [V: are] [ARG2: on the up escalator] [ARGM-CAU: thanks to talk of $ 100/barrel oil , a temporary decline in U.S. supplies , the approach of the " driving season " and President Donald Trump 's decision to re - impose sanctions on Iran] .
